text.div:
Expansion performed internally based on codesystem GRID-HAMD Answer Options CodeSystem v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 3 concepts

CodeSystemDisplay (en-US)
  Q17-1http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csAny recognition of depressive symptoms, with or without attribution to any cause, e.g., “I’m depressed because my partner always argues with me.
  Q17-2http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csDenies illness but accepts possibility of being ill, e.g., “I don’t think there’s anything wrong, but other people think there is.
  Q17-3http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csComplete denial of having any illness, e.g., “I’m not depressed; I’m fine.

Complete denial of having any illness, e.g., “I’m not depressed; I’m fine.

This value set contains 5 concepts

CodeSystemDisplay (en-US)
  Q9-1http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csAbsent (movements within normal range, e.g., occasionally shifts position in seat)
  Q9-2http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csMild (Doubtful or slight agitation, mild restlessness,e.g., frequently changing position in seat, foottapping, playing with hair, hands, or clothes)
  Q9-3http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csModerate (Moderate to marked restlessness or agitation, e.g., wringing hands, excessive scratching or picking)
  Q9-4http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csSevere (Cannot sit still or stay seated even for a short period of time; pacing)
  Q9-5http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-csVery Severe (Interview cannot be conducted)
